metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0030 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In binder_thread_release of binder.c, there is a possible use after freedue to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-145286050References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
